greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function for A244991: a(n) = A000035(A061395(n)).
comment: If a(n) = 1, then the largest prime p_k [where p_k = A000040(k) = A006530(n) and k = A061395(n)] dividing n has an odd index (i.e. k = 2h+1), otherwise, when a(n) = 0, it means that either n = 1 or the largest prime p_k|n has an even index (k = 2h).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 21 2014
